choices: With your head and hands in old time stocks in her ship’s cabin
1111113122.content:
The time had come for Queen Daenerys to retake her rightful throne. At long last, she finally had the ships to transport her and her entire army to Westeros. Saying goodbye to Meereen, she exited the great pyramid, with you following behind her on all-fours on a leash. A Dothraki appeared, offering a horse for her to take her to the ship. When he began to assist her in mounting the horse, she raised a hand to stop him.

“No need. I have a proper stool to assist me in mounting my horse right here.” She gave a pull on your leash. “Slave, in addition to being the foot stool for my throne, you’re also now my stepping stool to mount my horse. I didn’t think you were worthy at first, but I’ve decide to promote you anyway. Thank me for this honor.” She said, extending a foot to you. Understanding what she wanted, you kissed the top of her boots. “And the bottom.” She smirked down at you. Obediently, you followed the order, repeating the act with her other foot.

Removing her feet from your mouth, she placed a foot on your back, ready to step up onto you. While she was light, you were weak from the lack of feedings since she enslaved you. Daenerys then stepped onto your back; you started to shake under her full weight, but held strong until she got onto her horse.

The journey to her ship was short, but rough for you. Daenerys pulled you along by the leash attached to your collar while she rode her horse. She kept the pace slow enough not to drag you, but also fast enough that you had to sprint the entire way on foot to keep up. By the time you reached her ship, you were completely exhausted.

Dismounting her horse, Dany made her way to the docks, with you in tow on the leash behind her. The area before the docks was covered in a muddy marsh from the sea water. Dany frowned for a minute at this, however that soon turned into a smirk.

“Well, this is an issue. This area is completely covered in filth, and it’s not becoming for a Queen to muddy boots. Don’t you agree, slave?” Daenerys asked, tugging on your leash.

You had a good idea of what she was getting at, so you decided that sucking up to her might be the best way to get into her favor. “Y-Yes Master, I agree. Please let me assist you in anyway that I can....” you groveled in a lowly tone.

“As a girl, I had always heard songs about a Lord covering a muddy puddle with his jacket so his lover could walk over it unscathed. I’ve always wanted to have someone do that for me. Except in this case, your face will be the jacket. Lie on your back, so I can make it clean over you.” Daenerys said, hardly able to suppress her giggling.

This was clearly a ridiculous request, but who is a slave to argue with their master? Suppressing a sigh, you laid down on your back in the puddle, feeling the filthy water pool around your head. Dany looked down on you smugly.

“That’s better! You’re well suited for this role. Clearly you adore me more than any Lord ever adored his lover. I really ought to find more uses for you, you’re so varied! Serving as my foot stool, my step stool, now my personal bridge! I seem to have quite the talented slave.” Dany grinned down at you, knowing how patronizing she sounded. “But we really shouldn’t keep the ships waiting much longer, it’s time we take our leave.”

With that, Daenerys stepped forward, starting on your legs. She maneuvered over you quite well until she reached your torso. Under her full weight, it felt like your ribs would snap. You could feel yourself sinking further into the mud around her. Daenerys made a point to make eye contact with you at this point, to fully emphasis her superiority. The last thing you saw was her beautiful face smiling smugly down at you before your vision was obscured by the sole of her boot. You could feel her right foot leave your chest and join her left foot in standing on your face. Her feet twisted back and forth, as if she was wiping her feet on your face like a doormat. She was clearly just adding insult to injury at this point. Daenerys’s entire body weight standing squarely on your face made it felt like your skull was gonna cave in. After a few moments that felt like an eternity, she stepped off your face. However, the damage was done, and you slowly slipped into the black......

Where do you wake up at?
1111113122.title: Time to Depart to Westeros

choices: Daenerys wakes up in the night and you are not sniffing her feet
11111131221.content:
You slowly and groggily wake up in a dark room, blinking a few times to try and better adjust your vision. Noticing your hands and neck are feeling a very stiff pain, you try to move, but noticed you are restrained and can do little besides slightly wiggle. Feeling fear set in, you try to panic and yell but notice it’s muffled, as if something is stuffed in your mouth to gag you. Soon after you realize that, your taste buds become assaulted by a stale sour taste. As your eyes become acclimated to the dim lighting of the room, you realize where you are: bound at the foot of the Dragon Queen’s bed. Daenerys was barefoot, with her feet inches away from your bound face. You noticed her toes wiggling back in forth in front of your face, as if to mock you; you could see her beautiful face between the cracks of her toes, grinning smugly down upon you.

“I see you are finally awake. I was hoping we did not break you for good before we reached Westeros. It would have been a shame to have to find another human foot stool before I took my throne.” She said, chuckling to herself.

“Mph!” Came your muffled reply in response.

“Ah yes, I did not wish to hear your wretched voice, so I put a sock in it. My sock, to be precise. That way you could taste your owner’s feet while you continue to smell them.” Daenerys said, laughing. She lifted her barefoot up, placing her heel on your forehead. As if to emphasis her point, she slowly and deliberately wiped her sole down along the length of
your entire face. You could feel the trail of sweat from her feet leave a streak down your face. Despite suffering various humiliations at the hands (or more accurately, feet) of the Dragon Queen, your sense of shame had not yet dissipated, as you felt more degraded than ever in this position.

Daenerys continued to laugh at your misfortune. Then, she took her sole and slapped you across your cheek. “I cannot move past the fact of how pathetic you look. Your head and hands bound in stocks like a common street rat. Actually, even street rats aren’t gagged with dirty socks. When you were a slaver, you were most likely part of a great and powerful family that spanned centuries. Now, I’ve taken that from you. I’ve taken your name from you. I suppose I should rename you something more fitting, that shows the world what you are. Now you’re little more than Ser Sockeater, Lord of Toejam, Licker of Boots.” Amused by her own comment, she threw her head back in laughter and covered your entire face with both of the soles of her feet.

“Or not. I own you now, so I can refer to you however I wish. Don’t worry though, slave, I will never forget to make it humiliating for you.” She said, cocking her head in amusement. She leaned her right foot forward and grabbed your nose between two of her toes. With your mouth gagged with her sock, your airflow was completely cut off. Panic set in, as your natural instinct to breath was taken away from you. However, in your current state, the only thing you could do was beg Daenerys with your eyes to take pity on you.

The Targaryen Queen smiled down at you condescendingly. Your gaze met hers, and never had the differences between the two of you been more apparent: she was a regal and powerful queen who could do as she wished, and torment those who had slighted her however she saw fit. Conversely, you were her slave, a mere plaything to her who lived solely by her will; should you ever stop adoring her and stop worshipping the ground she walked on for even a moment, you shuddered to think what would happen.

“Do you know what it means to be owned, worm? It means your destiny is completely at the hands of another. Or should I say, at the feet of another.” She giggled. You could feel your face getting redder and redder by the moment. “I could completely snuff you out of existence in this moment, using only two of my toes, and no one would ever miss you. No one would mourn for you, no one would even remember you existed. And I would continue to live and rule, free to do whatever I wished. I decide what happens to you slave, I am your master, your God.”

Your began to become light headed, you needed air. You were terrified of this woman, she was clearly far more unhinged than anyone had realized. Her God-complex was insane. However, you wanted to live, and the more she broke you down, the more you began to think that maybe she really WAS your God. At long last, she released your nose from between her toes. You desperately breathed in whatever air you could; however, her foot was still close enough to your face that your hellacious gasps of air amounted to little more than sniffing her foot. The smell was overpowering; despite Queen Daenerys being beautiful, it’s evident the desert climate of Slaver’s Bay caused her feet to sweat profusely. She simply laughed at your predicament.

“I have decided to spare you in this instant. Never forget this moment, and never forget that I own you. Now, as a thanks for letting you keep living your worthless life, I think you should spend the night sniffing your master’s feet while she sleeps. If I wake up, and you’re not sniffing, I will hurt you in ways you won’t believe.” She said smiling smugly down at you. She took her right foot and ruffled your hair while she slapped your cheek again with the left one. “Good night, slave.”

This was going to be a long night.
